CustomField.formula: IF(loan__Last_Transaction_Type__c == 'loan__Repayment_Transaction_Adjustment__c' , 'Payment Reversed',(IF(loan__Last_Transaction_Type__c == 'Deposit Adjustment - Subtract',"Redraw",(CASE(1, IF(loan__Interest_Posting_Txn__c <> "" &&ISPICKVAL( loan__Interest_Posting_Txn__r.loan__Interest_Posting_Type__c ,'Regular') ,1,0),"Interest", IF(loan__Interest_Posting_Txn__c <> "" &&ISPICKVAL( loan__Interest_Posting_Txn__r.loan__Interest_Posting_Type__c ,'Additional Interest') ,1,0),"Line Fee", IF(ISPICKVAL( loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__r.loan__Payment_Type__c,'Waived')&&loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__r.loan__Applied_Spread__c!=null,1,0),"Charge Waived-"+ loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__r.loan__Applied_Spread__c , IF(loan__Loan_Charge__c <> "",1,0),loan__Loan_Charge__r.loan__Fee__r.Name, IF(loan__Disbursal_Reversal__c <> "",1,0),"Disbursal Reversal", IF(loan__Loan_Disbursal__c <> "",1,0),"Disbursement", IF(loan__Loan_Due_Detail__c <> "",1,0),"Bill", IF(loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__c <> "" &&(ISPICKVAL( loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__r.loan__Payment_Type__c,'Regular') || ISPICKVAL( loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__r.loan__Payment_Type__c,'Deposit Payment') ),1,0),"Payment Received", IF(loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__r.loan__Applied_Spread__c =null&&ISPICKVAL( loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__r.loan__Payment_Type__c,'Waived'),1,0),"Interest Waived",IF(loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__c <> "" &&ISPICKVAL( loan__Loan_Payment_Txn__r.loan__Payment_Type__c,'Closure-Tolerance') ,1,0),"Closure-Tolerance", IF((loan__Fees_Waived__c != 0) &&(loan__Principal_Paid__c =0),1,0),"Charge Waiver Reversal", IF(loan__Repayment_Txn_Reversal__r.loan__Payment_Type__c = 'Regular',1,0),"Payment Reversal","")))))
CustomField.label: Transaction Type
